body_html: @apaszke re. the large models expect files, I will let @ezyang who initially added those tests to decide. But IMO they are not that bad, the expect files are indeed big but the diffs on them are normally small and meaningful/human-readable. We definitely want to have a way to test exporting whole & real models (for the purpose of testing the tracer/exporter).

body: @apaszke re. the large models expect files, I will let @ezyang who initially added those tests to decide. But IMO they are not that bad, the expect files are indeed big but the diffs on them are normally small and meaningful/human-readable. We definitely want to have a way to test exporting whole & real models (for the purpose of testing the tracer/exporter).
